item.title: Bangalore to Munnar Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Munnar can be a delightful experience, as you'll get to explore the picturesque tea plantations, misty hills, and serene lakes of this charming hill station in Kerala. item.title: Bangalore to Lepakshi Solo Trip Plan
item.description: One day trip from Bangalore to Lepakshi, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this one day plan works very well. Lepakshi is a small village located in Anantapur district, Andhra Pradesh. It is around 120 KM from Bangalore. It is famous for Veerabhadra temple, one of the oldest temples in India.
